North Region.Content: Logo, Navigation Menu, User Avatar/Profile, Notifications
North Region.Style: Clean and professional with bank's color theme, non-intrusive font size, clear call to action for login

South Region.Content: Copyright information, contact details, links to terms of service or help
South Region.Style: Consistent with North region, smaller font size for legal disclaimers

East Region.Content: Quick access to Account Balance, Recent Transactions, and links to services
East Region.Style: Vertical menu with icons and concise text, interactive elements with hover effects

West Region.Content: Filters for transaction searches, search bar, additional information panels
West Region.Style: Subtle, light background to distinguish from Center, without drawing too much attention

Center Region.Content: Dynamic content such as user management forms, account statements, etc.
Center Region.Style: White background, clear and concise forms, data tables, use case-specific styling

界面跳转关联: Not explicitly defined in the text, but can be assumed that each region will have links or actions that navigate to related functionalities or information within the system.

主要界面.中间: 动态区域，显示不同内容

账户开设.中间: 个人信息和账户信息表单

存款.中间: 账户选择，输入存款金额表单

取款.中间: 账户选择，输入取款金额表单

账户查询.中间: 账户余额和交易历史列表
账户查询.南面: 打印或导出交易记录按钮（可选）

界面跳转关联.主要界面: 通过顶部导航链接跳转到二级界面
界面跳转关联.二级界面: 通过操作按钮或链接返回主要界面或其他二级界面

Main Dashboard.East: Quick access links or account overview
Main Dashboard.West: Vertical menu with links to each service
Main Dashboard.Center: Summary of accounts, recent transactions, and alerts

User Account Creation Interface.North: Title of the page and a navigation back button
User Account Creation Interface.East: Terms and conditions and a submit button
User Account Creation Interface.Center: Fields for account details and security questions

Deposit and Withdrawal Interface.North: Account selection dropdown and transaction type
Deposit and Withdrawal Interface.East: Transaction history for the selected account
Deposit and Withdrawal Interface.West: Fields for amount, account details, and a note section
Deposit and Withdrawal Interface.Center: Summary of the transaction and a confirmation button

Fund Transfer Interface.North: Title and a link back to account management
Fund Transfer Interface.West: From and To account dropdowns and a transfer amount field
Fund Transfer Interface.Center: Confirmation of the transfer details and a submit button

Loan Application Interface.North: Title and a progress bar for the application steps
Loan Application Interface.East: Buttons for next step or submit
Loan Application Interface.West: Form fields for loan details and personal information
Loan Application Interface.Center: Eligibility criteria and terms of the loan

Credit Card Service Interface.East: Application status and a button to submit the application

Account Inquiry Interface.North: Title and a search bar to filter transactions
Account Inquiry Interface.East: Downloadable statements and a print button
Account Inquiry Interface.West: Account selection and date range pickers

Report Generation Interface.North: Report type selector and date range filter
Report Generation Interface.East: List of available reports and an export button
Report Generation Interface.Center: Preview of the report and a generate button

Risk Management Interface.East: Logs and a button to acknowledge risks

System Management Interface.North: Title and a system status summary
System Management Interface.East: Maintenance tools and a button to apply updates

界面跳转关联: Not specified in the provided text
